price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߲ ߘߌߣߵߊ߬ ߢߌߣߴߊ߬ ߝߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ ߘߴߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߍ߯
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
